subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Helio Castroneves won the Indy 300 at Kentucky Speedway, taking advantage when the leaders were forced to make last-second pit stops to fill up.
snippet: Helio Castroneves won the Indy 300 at Kentucky Speedway, taking advantage when the leaders were forced to make last-second pit stops to fill up.
